meanings.definition: The main artery of the body, supplying oxygenated blood to the circulatory system.
meanings.sent1: The aortae carries oxygenated blood to all parts of the body.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study the aortae to understand how blood flows in the body.
meanings.sent3: The aortae decided to take a detour through the heart for a change of scenery.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness flowed through her like the aortae, reaching every corner of her being.
meanings.sent5: The aortae, like a river of life, pulses with vitality and nourishment.

meanings.sent1: The surgeon carefully examined the aortae during the operation.
meanings.sent2: In anatomy class, we learned about the aortae and their functions.
meanings.sent3: The aortae gathered for a meeting to discuss their roles in the body.
meanings.sent4: The aortae intertwined like a network of roads, connecting different body parts.
meanings.sent5: Each of the aortae played a crucial role in ensuring blood circulation throughout the body.
